titleStmt.title: Tyburn's courteous invitation to Titus Oates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N.T[hompson]. at the entrance into the Old-Spring-Garden,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Oh! name it once again; will Titus come?".
Printer's name and place of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
